amendment.description: Amendment increases National Science Foundation research and related activities funding by $9.1 million and decreases NSF salaries and expenses accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 52 in the Congressional Record of June 19, 1996 to reduce the funds appropriated in the bill for the National Science Foundation for salaries and expenses and to increase the appropriation for NSF research commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 245 - 170 (Roll no. 278).
